text: TABLE I: Examined question categories according to [15] Category _ SCQ Example ODP Boolean Is the sensor part of a module VDI 2206 in the system? Count How many technical resources VDI 3682 are contained within the system? Rank Could you provide the values DIN EN 61360 contained in the model in as- cending order? Simple Which process operators are VDI 3682 performed in process X? String Is there a DataElement with the ~ DIN EN 61360 name ”ResultAccuracy”? Two Hop Which components are part of VDI 2206 a module and which system in- cludes this module? Two Intent Of which process operators is VDI 3682 process X composed? To which technical resources are these process operators assigned?
